Name: ParCzech 4.0
Description: This corpus consists of stenographic protocols that record the Chamber of Deputies' meetings in the 7th term (2013-2017), the 8th term (2017-2021) and the current 9th term (2021-Jul 2023). The protocols are provided in their original HTML format as well as in the Parla-CLARIN TEI format. The corpus is automatically enriched with the morphological, syntactic, and named-entity annotations using the procedures UDPipe 2 and NameTag 2. The audio files are aligned with the texts in the annotated TEI files. The corpus is available for download from the LINDAT repository.
